name: Match Mania 3D
description:
Not like classic tile puzzle & mahjong games, Match Mania 3D doesn’t only connect your brain to logical thinking but also is a free & fun matching puzzle game which is easy for everyone to play.

HOW TO PLAY
- Just tap to pick the 3D items into the box. Three same items would be matched and you win a star. Collect all the objects as fast as possible.

- After you clear all items, you win and get the stars reward. More rewards as you are faster.

- If there are 7 different items in the box, you would fail.

- Take easy for the timer, we believe you have enough time to clear all items

- Each level theme and items would be change randomly, please enjoy it!
